text: @TMobile @Tesla #TMobileTuesdays #contest I’d take my #Tesla all over. Seriously! #COVID19 has reinvigorated the #Americanroadtrip so I’d load up the girl, husband, and the dogs and away we go! See the sights, breathe the fresh air and get a little #vacation and #mentalhealth days!
